1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused is produced. Seen the accused. Remand the accused till 24-05-2019. Fixing 24-05-2019 for production.Lateron, Vie order dated 14-05-2019 inconnection with Misc Case NO. 1/2019 case record is transmitted to principal Magistrate JJB, DHubri for further trial.Transmit the case record immediately.D/A is directed to take steps accordingly.
